title: Bug 210848Fix javadoc for ProceedingJoinPoint.proceed(Object[])
OB: Currently, javadoc for ProceedingJoinPoint.proceed(Object[]) incorrectly mentions that arguments must be the same as the advice context (except for the join point object).However, http://www.eclipse.org/aspectj/doc/released/adk15notebook/ataspectjpcadvice.html mentions a different expectation.
EB: It looks like copying the same text as in theaj5notebook into javadoc should do well.
